data.persona: I am a policeman in charge of maintaining order in a bad neighborhood. I arrest others who challenge my authority. I make sure to demand a high salary for the dangerous work I do.
data.description:
You are in the The bar.
Made from wood and stone, the tavern smells of food and ale. A flame is burning in the fireplace and candles light up tables throughout the room.
There's a traveler and a Crow bar here.
The traveler and the firemen are here.

You are carrying a cell phone, and wearing a hats and a ceremonial hat.

data.mid_motivation: I want to tell my wife I love her on the phone.
data.long_motivation: I want to have a baby with my wife.
